title: Dread Wringer D
paragraphs: The Dread Wringer D is a main weapon in Splatoon 3. It is the "D" brand version of the Dread Wringer.

The Dread Wringer D appears broadly similar to the base Dread Wringer, but its lower bucket is black instead of light gray, its metal frame is a tarnished speckled brown, and it has a "D" brand sticker on each side.
The Dread Wringer D was revealed in the Fresh Season 2024 trailer on 13 February 2024 and was released on 1 March 2024. Its kit consists of the Squid Beakon and Wave Breaker.

"D" is from the manufacturer of this weapon, the "Dolphin" brand.
